E3SM-1-1.source:

land: ELM (v1.1, same grid as atmos; active biogeochemistry using the Converging Trophic Cascade plant and soil carbon and nutrient mechanisms to represent carbon, nitrogen and phosphorus cycles), MOSART (v1.1, 0.5 degree latitude/longitude grid)

ocean: MPAS-Ocean (v6.0, oEC60to30 unstructured SVTs mesh with 235160 cells and 714274 edges, variable resolution 60 km to 30 km; 60 levels; top grid cell 0-10 m)

source_type.AER: aerosol treatment in an atmospheric model where concentrations are calculated based on emissions, transformation, and removal processes (rather than being prescribed or omitted entirely)
source_type.AGCM: atmospheric general circulation model run with prescribed ocean surface conditions and usually a model of the land surface
source_type.AOGCM: coupled atmosphere-ocean global climate model, additionally including explicit representation of at least the land and sea ice
source_type.BGC: biogeochemistry model component that at the very least accounts for carbon reservoirs and fluxes in the atmosphere, terrestrial biosphere, and ocean
source_type.CHEM: chemistry treatment in an atmospheric model that calculates atmospheric oxidant concentrations (including at least ozone), rather than prescribing them
source_type.LAND: land model run uncoupled from the atmosphere
source_type.OGCM: ocean general circulation model run uncoupled from an AGCM but, usually including a sea-ice model
source_type.RAD: radiation component of an atmospheric model run 'offline'
source_type.SLAB: slab-ocean used with an AGCM in representing the atmosphere-ocean coupled system

frequency.1hrCM: monthly-mean diurnal cycle resolving each day into 1-hour means
frequency.1hrPt: sampled hourly, at specified time point within an hour
frequency.3hrPt: sampled 3 hourly, at specified time point within the time period
frequency.6hrPt: sampled 6 hourly, at specified time point within the time period
frequency.monC: monthly climatology computed from monthly mean samples
frequency.monPt: sampled monthly, at specified time point within the time period
frequency.subhrPt: sampled sub-hourly, at specified time point within an hour
frequency.yrPt: sampled yearly, at specified time point within the time period

esm-1150os-actall.description: End of century budget at 1150 GtCO2 with overshoot. Land forcing with BECCS representation in LUC-LCC. Enabled CDR interventions using explicit OAE and BECCS.
esm-1150os-actall.experiment: Scenario EoC 1150 Gt CO2 with overshoot and enabled CDR (explicit OAE and BECCS)

esm-1150-actall.experiment: Scenario Pk 1150 Gt CO2 with overshoot and enabled CDR (explicit OAE and BECCS)

esm-1150os-nocdr.description: Baseline of EoC 1150 GtCO2 with overshoot. No CDR interventions.
esm-1150os-nocdr.experiment: No-CDR baseline for esm-1150os-actall with disabled CDR

1150os-nocdr-esmco2.description: Baseline of EoC 1150 GtCO2 with overshoot. No CDR interventions. CO2 prescribed from emission driven scenario with enabled CDR interventions (actall).
1150os-nocdr-esmco2.experiment: Concentration-driven no-CDR baseline for esm-1150os-actall with disabled CDR. CO2 prescribed from the emission-driven scenario with enabled CDR (actall)

esm-1150os-actoae.description: End of century budget at 1150 GtCO2 with overshoot. Land forcing with BECCS representation in LUC-LCC. Enabled CDR interventions using explicit OAE and IAMs prescribed exchanges for BECCS
esm-1150os-actoae.experiment: Scenario EoC 1150 Gt CO2 with overshoot and enabled CDR (explicit OAE and prescribed BECCS)

esm-1150-actoae.experiment: Scenario Pk 1150 Gt CO2 with overshoot and enabled CDR (explicit OAE and prescribed BECCS)

esm-500os-actoae.experiment: Scenario EoC 500 Gt CO2 with overshoot and enabled CDR (explicit OAE and prescribed BECCS)

esm-500-actoae.experiment: Scenario Pk 500 Gt CO2 with overshoot and enabled CDR (explicit OAE and prescribed BECCS)

esm-500os-nooae.experiment: No-CDR baseline for esm-1150os-actoae with disabled OAE

esm-500os-nooae-esmco2.experiment: Concentration-driven no-CDR baseline for esm-1150os-actoae with disabled CDR. CO2 prescribed from the emission-driven scenario with enabled CDR (actoae)
